original_text: One day he got into a boat with his disciples, and he said to them, “Let us go across to the other side of the lake.” So they set out,

sentences.original_text: One day he got into a boat with his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 그는 제자들과 함께 배에 탔고

sentences.original_text: Let us go across to the other side of the lake
